name: com.github.nufeng1999
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.debug: changever.cmd && cp -r index.html www/ && cordova run android --debug --  --packageType apk --keystore=chatai-release-key.keystore --alias=myalias --storePassword=cqcbit --password=cqcbit
scripts.release: changever.cmd && cp -r index.html www/ && cordova build android --release --  --packageType apk --keystore=chatai-release-key.keystore --alias=myalias --storePassword=cqcbit --password=cqcbit

author: Apache Cordova Team
